title: ERP Systems Administrator & SQL Developer
description: Analyzed and integrated APIs from 10+ companies to develop custom solutions for e-commerce platforms, leading to a 15% increase in customer engagement through enhanced product offerings
Developed and optimized ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes for Metabase, enhancing data accuracy and enabling more timely and informed reporting for stakeholders
Leveraged PostgreSQL data to identify trending products for over 30 clients, streamlining inventory management and reducing stockouts by 15%, contributing to a 10% increase in sales efficiency.
Created dynamic and insightful data visualizations using BI tools, empowering teams to track key metrics and uncover business trends, leading to a 30% improvement in operational decision-making.
Provided strategic consulting to e-commerce clients, optimizing store operations and contributing to improved sales performance.

title: Mobile Application Developer (Erasmus+ Intern)
description: Ensured high performance and cross-device compatibility, optimizing app responsiveness and smooth operation across various Android devices
Implemented essential features such as user authentication, data storage with SQLite, and a dynamic user interface, which improved the overall user experience and functionality of the app

Developed and deployed Android mobile applications using Java and Android Studio, following object-oriented programming (OOP) principles to create scalable and maintainable code.
Designed a tourist places app with an integrated interactive map and API functionality, allowing users to explore nearby tourist destinations with detailed information

title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and QA specialists, to design and implement RESTful APIs and user interfaces for over 5 event websites and company pages in Bydgoszcz, ensuring seamless integration and a 10% improvement in user interaction

Spearheaded the development and maintenance of both front-end and back-end features, leveraging JavaScript, Node.js, Express, and React to build dynamic, responsive applications that improved user experience and system performance
Implemented an efficient content management system (CMS), allowing event organizers and business owners to update their sites independently, improving workflow and reducing update times by 40%

title: Graphic Designer Intern
description: Created vector graphics using Adobe Illustrator
Gained knowledge in print production and publishing processes
Collaborated effectively within a design team on various creative projects
Developed a strong understanding of color management and layout for print, ensuring consistency across all deliverables and contributing to a 10% increase in client satisfaction
